title: Пол Маккартни
author: Prikhodko Alexander
description:
Do you really believe it requires description? Just emotions, deep thoughts and satisfaction from this very creative masterpiece. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas, where ropes have the symbolic meaning of the playing instrument used by the legend. 'Paul McCartney' is related to realism being a representative of portraits genre. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
